nodes.text: In Their Own Words: Making The Empire Strikes Back
In Their Own Words: Making the Empire Strikes Back is an article in Star Wars Insider 119 that interviews many of the actors involved with making Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
Stars interviewed include Irvin Kershner, Howie Weed, Kenneth Colley, Ian Liston, Jeremy Bulloch and Peter Mayhew. Mark Newbold conducted a new interview with Bossk actor Alan Harris.
